text: A tiger has captured a fox. "You can't eat me", said the fox. The Emperor of Heaven has made me king over all animals. If you eat me, the Emperor will punish you for disobeying his orders. And if you don't believe me, come with me. You'll see all the animals run away as soon as they see me and no one comes near. The tiger agreed to accompany him and as soon as the other animals saw them coming, they fled. The tiger thought they were afraid of the fox and didn't realize they were running for him. FIN
title: El zorro que aprovechó el poder del tigre
author: nan Anónimo
